SELECT NOTICE_NO , USER_NAME , CS_CATEGORY_NAME , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = NOTICE_WRITER) JOIN CS_CATEGORY USING(CS_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

AND ?
